FuncDef: This command specifies the port to be synchronized with the multi-chassis peer and a synchronization tag to be used while synchronizing this port with the multi-chassis peer.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the port to be synchronized with the multi-chassis peer. Values-slot/mda/port||, lag-id|lag-id|, |lag|keyword, |id|1 to 800, pw-id|pw-id|, |pw|keyword, |id|1 to 10239, eth-sat-id (7950 XRS only)|esat-id/slot/port|, |esat|keyword, |id|1 to 20.
Specifies a synchronization tag to be used while synchronizing this port with the multi-chassis peer. The tag can be up to 32 characters long.
